title: Want to Be a Beaver?
description: Students often imagine what it might be like to be another animal. In Want to Be a Beaver? students will learn all about these unique, hardworking creatures. Brilliant, detailed photographs and captions support the text. A map and interesting graphics provide additional information. As they read this book, students will have the opportunity to learn about main ideas, details, and plural nouns.
meta: beaver, colony, dam, lodge, nocturnal, store
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Discriminate Initial Consonant Blend : Discriminate initial consonant st-blends
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
Question Words : Understand and use question words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
